name: grid.token.art.01
description:
Owners who collected and burned a grid.token get the chance receive a unique artwork created by Mark Knol. The artwork will be creatively and procedurally painted using provided avatar/photo/art of choice and send to their Tezos wallet as NFT. The collected grid will be the base for the new artwork.  
---

This OBJKT is the second result of the first collected + burned "grid.token.01" (OBJKT #347713).

Personal note:  
Chris requested this artwork to be a tribute to an artwork called "Oprah" by Michele Petrelli (OBJKT #164776). The abstract portrait has a really good composition and great contrasting lighting. The result has a sense of a portrait, yet it stays very mysterious. Thanks Chris!

More info about grid.tokens https://grid-tokens.stroep.nl/

grid.token.01 was claimed by 
Chris Cassano (tz1NM2GD7d8L9oYurYSy3R1Cy7ZAU1ExDyC6) @chriscassano

More about Michele Petrelli (https://hicetnunc.xyz/MPetrelli) can be found on michelepetrelliart.com and instagram @michelepetrelliart
